details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-4:2020 - 6.1.9 Inline image dictionaries
details.description: The value of the F key in the Inline Image dictionary shall not be LZW, LZWDecode, Crypt, a value not listed in ISO 32000-2:2020, 8.9.7, Table 92, or an array containing any such value.

rule.description: The value of the F key in the Inline Image dictionary shall not be LZW, LZWDecode, Crypt, a value not listed in ISO 32000-2:2020, 8.9.7, Table 92, or an array containing any such value.
rule.test: internalRepresentation == "ASCIIHexDecode" || internalRepresentation == "ASCII85Decode" || internalRepresentation == "FlateDecode" || internalRepresentation == "RunLengthDecode" || internalRepresentation == "CCITTFaxDecode" || internalRepresentation == "DCTDecode" || internalRepresentation == "AHx" || internalRepresentation == "A85" || internalRepresentation == "Fl" || internalRepresentation == "RL" || internalRepresentation == "CCF" || internalRepresentation == "DCT"

error.message: Inline image uses LZW, Crypt or one of the unknown filters
